{{short description|2018 Mythopoeic Society conference}}
{{convention|image=|title=Mythcon 49|location=Atlanta, Georgia|organizer=[[Mythopoeic Society]]|dates=20 July - 23 July [[2018]]|attendees=|previous=[[Mythcon 48]]|next=[[Mythcon 50]]}}'''Mythcon 49''' was the forty-ninth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "On the Shoulders of Giants"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Robin Anne Reid Ph.D. (Professor of Literature and Languages), and [[Donato Giancola]] (artist)
